ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I quickly wrote up the code and posted a temporary site at:

http://www.fortunecity.com/skyscraper/techie/642

It contains a few pictures. The backgrounds and settings are not as good as
the pictures I've received in the mail, but I intended the pictures to be a
fashion thing rather than the environment. hehe. If I have time, I might
reformat the site and put other people's screenshots on it (as long as they
agree). Otherwise, I will take down the site in a few days.
